scripts.clean: manypkg exec rm -rf node_modules && manypkg exec rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build: manypkg exec rm -rf dist && manypkg run @signalwire/core build && manypkg run @signalwire/webrtc build && manypkg run @signalwire/js build && manypkg run @signalwire/node build
scripts.start:web: concurrently "manypkg run @signalwire/core start" "manypkg run @signalwire/js start" "manypkg run @signalwire/webrtc start" "manypkg run @signalwire/js example"
scripts.start:next: concurrently "manypkg run @signalwire/js start" "manypkg run with-next.js dev"
